name: Redirectioneaza
description: Redirectioneaza.ro contains information on over 2.700 NGOs that can be supported through a simple process of redirecting 3.5% of income tax. By digitizing the 230 form, we have eliminated the need for direct contact between NGOs and their supporters, as many organizations do not have the necessary resources to gather these forms offline.

SDGs.evidenceText: Every year, any citizen can choose to redirect 3.5% of their income tax to a cause they believe in and want to support. However, most never do so for two reasons: a cumbersome process and a lack of centralized information about the NGOs they could support. Moreover, NGOs also face the difficulty of spreading their appeals for redirection to very large audiences, in a simple way, without using up additional resources. Redirectioneaza.ro contains information on over 2.700 NGOs that can be supported through a simple process of redirecting 3.5% of income tax. By digitizing the 230 form, we have eliminated the need for direct contact between NGOs and their supporters, as many organizations do not have the necessary resources to gather these forms offline.
